Migrating to Online Store 2.0
 Troubleshooting
 Theme Store
 Troubleshooting theme errors
 Below are some errors that you might encounter while working on your theme. Click the link for details.
 Parameter Missing or Invalid: Required parameter missing or invalid
 Description can't be larger than 64 kilobytes
 Browser address bar warnings, inconsistent or missing elements
